cause.description:
Founded in 1988, we are a nonprofit organization dedicated to rescuing abandoned rabbits and educating the public about rabbit care. We are headquartered in Richmond, California and have over 120 licensed educators and fosterers and 30 local chapters across the United States, Canada, and Asia. To date we have rescued and found adoptive homes for more than 10,000 rabbits. For more information, go to http://www.rabbit.org/hrs-info/index.html
1. Rabbits make great house pets!
2. Rabbits are not for Easter only.
cause.mission: promote the care of rabbits as house pets, and provide emergency care to abandoned, abused, or unwanted rabbits.
cause.name: House Rabbit Society
